summary: Jan Dara grows up in a house lacking in love but abundant in lust. He quickly picks up the sinful way of life of his stepfather, Khun Luang who married his mother after she became pregnant ... See full summary »
cast: Eakarat Sarsukh|Suwinit Panjamawat|Kanchit Thamthong|Santisuk Promsiri|Wipawee Charoenpura|Christy Chung|Patharawarin Timkul|Wanlapa Promnaul|Jenjira Pongpas|Thana Komentiti|Sukanya Kongkawong|Sasithorn Panichnok|Nam-Nguen Boonnak|Niwat Pibulsiri|Pornprom Saibour|Tanai Tanachanun|Surasak Buaploy|Saroj Glinsaroj|Amornrat Sangthong|Nirut Saosudchart|Prasarn Intarit|Jakrawan Worasap|Krittikrai Patbunlueng|Anong Nakhasun|Wutichai Sapapat|Wisan Thipsuwan|Chitlda Charoenlarp|Pimprapa Thangprapaporn|Nattporn Wongsaroj|Sarawut Matrakul|Naruedee Nimanong|Chanikarn Pothiraj|Kamolchanok Buanamoom
title: Jan Dara
